@description.name: @description

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} Test class. Must be a sub class of {@link TestCase}.
@param.description: Test class. Must be a sub class of {@link TestCase}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property name. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #name}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property name. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #name}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property name. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #name}.
